comments.body:
note: No license file yet, but an issue has been raised upstream.

xref: https://github.com/tomviner/pytest-ast-back-to-python/issues/5

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@  home: https://github.com/tomviner/pytest-ast-back-to-python
  license: BSD-3
  license_family: BSD
  summary: 'A plugin for pytest devs to view how assertion rewriting recodes the AST'
  dev_url: https://github.com/tomviner/pytest-ast-back-to-python
